get.description: Get the list of products related to a \

parameters.name: influencer_name
parameters.description: Example value: madison.lecroy

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Influencer Post ID (e.g. amzn1.ideas.1N84PQ3CI4NW0) of the list post for which to get product items (only posts with post_type=List are allowed).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Set the cursor value from the response of the previous call to get the next results page.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

get.description: Get and paginate through product reviews on Amazon using a logged in user cookie string. Each page contains up to 10 reviews.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: Product asin for which to get reviews.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page to return. Default: 1

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Return reviews in a specific sort order. Default: TOP_REVIEWS Allowed values: TOP_REVIEWS, MOST_RECENT

parameters.name: star_rating
parameters.description: Only return reviews with a specific star rating. Default: ALL Allowed values: ALL, 5_STARS, 4_STARS, 3_STARS, 2_STARS, 1_STARS, POSITIVE, CRITICAL

parameters.name: verified_purchases_only
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: images_or_videos_only
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: current_format_only
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Find reviews matching a search query.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of review fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: review_title,review_images,review_date,country

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

get.description: Convert an Amazon ASIN to GTIN / EAN / UPS identifiers. Valid values for `type` are `EAN-13`, `UPC`, or `ISBN`.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: Amazon product ASIN to convert.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

get.description: Get all Amazon Influencer posts with pagination support.

parameters.name: influencer_name
parameters.description: The Amazon Influencer name for which to get posts

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Return the results in a specific scope. Default: ALL Allowed values: ALL, IDEA_LISTS, PHOTOS, VIDEOS

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Find posts matching a search query.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor to get the next set of results, it can be used for for paging purposes. Note: the cursor value for the next set of results is returned by this endpoint under data.cursor.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to return. Default: 20 Allowed values: 1-100

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of influencer post fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: post_url,post_title,is_pinned,video_duration

get.description: Get the products offered by an Amazon promo code.

parameters.name: promo_code
parameters.description: Promo code for which to get products. The promo code can be extracted from the /promocode Amazon URL. For example the promo code for https://www.amazon.com/promocode/A31M10S4V50SOU is A31M10S4V50SOU.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: language

get.description: Get the products of a specific deal by Deal ID. Supports pagination using the *page* parameter. For now, only works for MULTI_ITEM deals with no canonical_deal_url (i.e. when deal_url is in the form of *https://amazon_domain/deal/deal_id*).

parameters.name: deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID of the deal to fetch

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Return products in a specific order. Default: FEATURED Allowed values: FEATURED, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST, BEST_SELLERS

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page to return. Default: 1

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of deal product fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: product_title,deal_price,deal_badge

get.description: Get Amazon Best Sellers, including prices, ratings, rank and more data points available on Amazon Best Sellers listings. Supports all Amazon Best Seller list types using the `type` parameter: **Best Sellers**, **New Releases**, **Movers \u0026 Shakers**, **Most Wished For**, **Gift Ideas**.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Best sellers category to return products for. Supports top level best sellers categories (e.g. software). In addition, subcategories / category path can be specified as well, separated by / (e.g. software/229535) - this can be seen in best sellers URLs, e.g. https://www.amazon.com/Best-Sellers-Software-Business-Office/zgbs/software/229535. Examples: software software/229535

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of Best Seller list to return. Default: BEST_SELLERS Allowed values: BEST_SELLERS, GIFT_IDEAS, MOST_WISHED_FOR, MOVERS_AND_SHAKERS, NEW_RELEASES

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page to return. Default: 1

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of product fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: product_title,product_url,product_photo

get.description: Get extensive Amazon product details and information available on the Amazon product page by asin, including title, price data, ratings data, local and global top reviews, photos, product details (brand, weight, package size, model, etc) product variations (colors, sizes, flavors, etc), and many other data points. Here's an example product page: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CMZFCQ6D](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CMZFCQ6D).

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: Product ASIN for which to get details. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma. Examples: B08BHXG144 B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V,B08BHXG144 Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: autoselect_variant
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: more_info_query
parameters.description: A query to search and get more info about the product as part of Product Information, Customer Q&As, and Customer Reviews.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of product fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume

get.description: Get all Amazon product details as available via the Product Details endpoint with an additional `offers` array containing product offers (The first offer in the array is the pinned offer returned by the **Search** endpoint). Supports pagination using the `page` and `limit` parameters.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: Product ASIN for which to get offers. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma. Example: B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V,B08BHXG144 Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: product_condition
parameters.description: Find products in specific conditions, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: NEW, USED_LIKE_NEW, USED_VERY_GOOD, USED_GOOD, USED_ACCEPTABLE. Default: NEW, USED_LIKE_NEW, USED_VERY_GOOD, USED_GOOD, USED_ACCEPTABLE Examples: NEW,USED_LIKE_NEW USED_VERY_GOOD,USED_GOOD,USED_LIKE_NEW

parameters.name: delivery
parameters.description: Find products with specific delivery option, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: PRIME_ELIGIBLE,FREE_DELIVERY. Examples: FREE_DELIVERY PRIME_ELIGIBLE,FREE_DELIVERY

parameters.name: autoselect_variant
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of offers to return. Default: 100

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page to return. Default: 1

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of product and offer fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: product_price,product_information,product_condition,ships_from

get.description: Search for products \u0026 offers on Amazon with pagination support and multiple filters and options such as sort option, price range, product condition filter, and more.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (supports both free-form text queries or a product asin).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page to return. Default: 1

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Return the results in a specific sort order. Default: RELEVANCE Allowed values: RELEVANCE, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST, BEST_SELLERS

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Find products in a specific category / department (e.g. computers-intl-ship). Use the Product Category List endpoint to get a list of valid categories and their ids for the country specified in the request. For numeric Amazon category IDs, use the category parameter instead. Default: aps (All Departments)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by specific numeric Amazon category. The category ID can be obtained from the Amazon category results URL, for example: https://amazon.com/s?node=2858778013 - the Amazon Category ID is 2858778013. Multiple category values can be separated by comma (e.g. categoryId1,categoryId2).

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of 105.34 means $105.34.

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of 105.34 means $105.34.

parameters.name: product_condition
parameters.description: Return products in a specific condition. Default: ALL Allowed values: ALL, NEW, USED, RENEWED, COLLECTIBLE

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Find products with a specific brand. Multiple brands can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. The brand values can be seen from Amazon's search left filters panel, as seen here. Examples: SAMSUNG Google,Apple

parameters.name: seller_id
parameters.description: Find products sold by specific seller (merchant). Multiple sellers can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. Examples: A02211013Q5HP3OMSZC7W AM7YCCDZROLB2,A1D09S7Q0OD6TH

parameters.name: is_prime
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: deals_and_discounts
parameters.description: Return deals and discounts in a specific condition. Default: NONE Allowed values: NONE, ALL_DISCOUNTS, TODAYS_DEALS

parameters.name: four_stars_and_up
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: additional_filters
parameters.description: Any filters available on the Amazon page but not part of this endpoint's parameters. The filter values can be extracted from the rh parameter in the Amazon search URL after applying the filter of interest on the Amazon search results page. Multiple filters are supported and can be separated by comma (,). For example, when searching for science books with the Paperback book format filter selected, the Amazon URL is: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=science+books&rh=p_n_feature_browse-bin%3A2656022011 a

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of product fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume

get.description: Get Amazon Deals (Today's Deals / Top Deals, Best Deals, and Lightning Deals) with support for all deal types, filters, and options available on Amazon.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. Default: US Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG, ZA, IE

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of results to skip / index to start from (for pagination).

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Return deals with products in specific categories / departments. Multiple categories can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. Numeric category id's can be found in the URL after selecting a specific category on https://www.amazon.com/deals. Examples: 502394 2619525011,2617941011

parameters.name: min_product_star_rating
parameters.description: Return deals with products star rating greater than a specific value Default: ALL Allowed values: ALL, 1, 2, 3, 4

parameters.name: price_range
parameters.description: Return deals with price within a specific price range. 1 is lowest price range shown on Amazon (e.g. Under $25) while 5 is the highest price range (e.g. $200 & Above). Default: ALL Allowed values: ALL, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

parameters.name: discount_range
parameters.description: Return deals with discount within a specific discount range. 1 is lowest discount range shown on Amazon (e.g. 10% off or more) while 5 is the highest discount range (e.g. 70% off or more). Default: ALL Allowed values: ALL, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

parameters.name: brands
parameters.description: Return deals with products by specific brands. Multiple brands can be specified separated by comma (,). In addition, brand names can be found under the Brand filter on the filter/refinements panel on https://www.amazon.com/deals (when applicable). Examples: AQUA CREST Daixers,Antarctic Star

parameters.name: prime_early_access
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: prime_exclusive
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: lightning_deals
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the results. In case not specified, results will be returned in the default domain language. Supported languages per country: US: en_US, es_US AU: en_AU BR: pt_BR CA: en_CA, fr_CA FR: fr_FR, en_GB DE: de_DE, en_GB, cs_CZ, nl_NL, pl_PL, tr_TR, da_DK IN: en_IN, hi_IN, ta_IN, te_IN, kn_IN, ml_IN, bn_IN, mr_IN IT: it_IT, en_GB MX: es_MX NL: nl_NL, en_GB SG: en_SG ES: es_ES, pt_PT, en_GB TR: tr_TR AE: en_AE, ar_AE GB: en_GB JP: ja_JP, en_US, zh_CN SA: ar_AE, en_AE PL: pl_PL SE: sv_SE,

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of deal fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned. Example: deal_type,deal_title,deal_ends_at,savings_amount
